SEARCH
Package com.rehmaan.groupbot.database

Class CommonQueries

java.lang.Object
com.rehmaan.groupbot.database.CommonQueries
public class CommonQueries extends Object
this class contains some common queries that cannot be attributed to a single feature of the bot

  • Method Details

    • getByMessageId

      public static org.json.JSONObject getByMessageId(String messageId, String channelId) throws IOException, org.apache.http.ParseException, HttpRetryException
      returns an alert by messageId
      Parameters:
      messageId - messageId of teams
      channelId - channelId of the teams
      Returns:
      JSONObject for the alert. If no alert found then returns null
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if call to database not successful
      org.apache.http.ParseException - thrown if response from database cannot be parsed into a json object
      HttpRetryException - thrown if status code returned was not 200 for the database call

    • getByESId

      public static org.json.JSONObject getByESId(String esId, String channelId) throws IOException, org.apache.http.ParseException, HttpRetryException
      returns an alert by elastic search document id
      Parameters:
      esId - elastic search document id
      channelId - channelId of teams
      Returns:
      JSON object for the alert with the corresponding document id. if not found then returns null
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if call to database not successful
      org.apache.http.ParseException - thrown if response from database cannot be parsed into a json object
      HttpRetryException - thrown if status code returned was not 200 for the database call

    • deleteByMessageId

      public static void deleteByMessageId(String id, boolean isTeamsId, String channelId) throws IOException, org.apache.http.ParseException, HttpRetryException
      Deletes an alert from the database
      Parameters:
      id - Elastic search document id or the teams Message Id
      isTeamsId - boolean value to determine whether the id is teams message id or an elastic search document id
      channelId - channelId of teams
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if call to database not successful
      org.apache.http.ParseException - thrown if response from database cannot be parsed into a json object
      HttpRetryException - thrown if status code returned was not 200 for the database call

    • getAllChannels

      public static List<String> getAllChannels() throws IOException, org.apache.http.ParseException, HttpRetryException
      returns a list of channels in which our bot is installed and user is signed in
      Returns:
      a list of strings that contains channelId of all channels in which our bot is installed and user is signed in
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if call to database not successful
      org.apache.http.ParseException - thrown if response from database cannot be parsed into a json object
      HttpRetryException - thrown if status code returned was not 200 for the database call
